summary: A 5-day adventure in Paris exploring the best local sights, cuisine, and culture. This itinerary is tailored for art, history, food enthusiasts with a moderate budget.

activities.title: Morning at the Louvre
activities.description: Explore one of the world's largest art museums, home to thousands of works including the Mona Lisa.

activities.title: Lunch at Café Marly
activities.description: Enjoy French cuisine with a view of the Louvre's courtyard and pyramid.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a boat cruise along the Seine River, viewing Paris's iconic landmarks from the water.

activities.title: Dinner in Le Marais
activities.description: Experience the vibrant neighborhood of Le Marais and enjoy dinner at a traditional bistro.

activities.title: Morning at Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: Visit the Musée d'Orsay, housed in the former Orsay railway station, and known for its collection of impressionist art.

activities.title: Lunch at Café Marly
activities.description: Enjoy French cuisine with a view of the Louvre's courtyard and pyramid.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a boat cruise along the Seine River, viewing Paris's iconic landmarks from the water.

activities.title: Dinner in Le Marais
activities.description: Experience the vibrant neighborhood of Le Marais and enjoy dinner at a traditional bistro.

activities.title: Morning at Montmartre
activities.description: Explore the charming hilltop neighborhood of Montmartre, known for its artistic history and the beautiful Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

activities.title: Lunch at Café Marly
activities.description: Enjoy French cuisine with a view of the Louvre's courtyard and pyramid.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a boat cruise along the Seine River, viewing Paris's iconic landmarks from the water.

activities.title: Dinner in Le Marais
activities.description: Experience the vibrant neighborhood of Le Marais and enjoy dinner at a traditional bistro.

activities.title: Morning at Eiffel Tower
activities.description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower, one of the world's most recognized landmarks and enjoy panoramic views of Paris.

activities.title: Lunch at Café Marly
activities.description: Enjoy French cuisine with a view of the Louvre's courtyard and pyramid.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a boat cruise along the Seine River, viewing Paris's iconic landmarks from the water.

activities.title: Dinner in Le Marais
activities.description: Experience the vibrant neighborhood of Le Marais and enjoy dinner at a traditional bistro.

activities.title: Morning at Versailles
activities.description: Take a day trip to the Palace of Versailles, the former royal residence known for its opulent décor, Hall of Mirrors, and expansive gardens.

activities.description: Enjoy French cuisine with a view of the Louvre's courtyard and pyramid.
